air_density.description: The mass of air per unit volume.

station_pressure.description: The atmospheric pressure at the station.

delta_t.description: The difference between air temperature and dew point.

dew_point.description: The temperature at which air becomes saturated with moisture.

feels_like.description: The apparent temperature considering humidity and wind.

heat_index.description: The perceived temperature due to air temperature and humidity.

lightning_strike_count.description: The number of lightning strikes detected.

lightning_detected_last_3_hrs.description: The number of lightning strikes detected in the last 3 hours.

lightning_distance_detected.description: The estimated distance of detected lightning strikes.

lightning_last_detected.description: The time since the last lightning strike was detected.

relative_humidity.description: The percentage of moisture in the air relative to saturation.

sea_level_pressure.description: The atmospheric pressure adjusted to sea level.

solar_radiation.description: The power per unit area received from the Sun.

timestamp.description: The date and time of the observation.

timestamp_unix.description: The timestamp in Unix time format.

uv_index.description: The ultraviolet index indicating the level of UV radiation.

wet_bulb_temperature.description: The lowest temperature air can reach by evaporative cooling.

wind_chill.description: The perceived decrease in air temperature felt by the body.

wind_direction.description: The direction from which the wind is blowing.

wind_gust.description: The peak wind speed during a short time interval.

wind_lull.description: The minimum wind speed during a short time interval.
